questions.question:
A small ball with mass \( M = 0.2 \) rests on a vertical column of height \( h = 5 \). A bullet with mass \( m = 0.01 \), moving with velocity \( v_0 = 500 \), passes horizontally through the center of the ball. The ball reaches the ground at a horizontal distance \( s = 20 \).

Determine the horizontal distance at which the bullet reaches the ground.

Assume that Air resistance is negligible. The sizes of the ball and the bullet are negligible. \( g = 10 \).
*Do not include units in your answer.*
